ygData.subject: should we have to kill a fellow paladin for a sword??
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail!! I am just looking for opinions on why you think Verant would put Ghoulsbane on a paladin NPC. As far as I know, the Froglok King is a good paladin and
ygData.messageBody:
Hail!! I am just looking for opinions on why you think Verant would put
Ghoulsbane on a paladin NPC. As far as I know, the Froglok King is a good
paladin and in order for us to obtain the Ghoulsbane, we have to kill him.
In a role-playing sense, that is making a RPer make a tough decision. Stay
in role and go without a powerful sword or just kill the big frog not caring
about what a paladin stands for.

Abrell of Cazic
